mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ranking(`round`, `rank`, `name`, `score`, `time`, `gmt_create`, `gmt_modify`) values (#{round}, #{rank}, #{name}, #{score}, #{time}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select `id`, `name`, `rank`, `score`, `time` from tbl_ranking where `name` = #{name} and `status` = 1 order by `id`
